about_the_game:
Lore Restore is a captivating text-based puzzle game that challenges you to unlock hidden messages through clever code-breaking and wordplay. Whether you’re a fan of ciphers or just love a good puzzle, this game will test your decoding skills and keep you engaged with its wide range of content.

Key Features

  • Diverse Puzzles: Tackle a wide variety of puzzles that challenge your logic, pattern recognition, and problem-solving abilities. Each cipher brings a unique twist, keeping the gameplay fresh and intriguing.
  • Steam Workshop Support: Expand your experience by creating and sharing your own puzzles with the community. With full Steam Workshop integration, you can craft your own challenges or enjoy endless new puzzles from other players.
  • Endless Replayability: Enjoy a constantly evolving library of built-in puzzles and community-generated content. There’s always a new challenge waiting to be solved in Lore Restore.
  • Simple and Intuitive Interface: Dive straight into the puzzles with a clean, user-friendly interface designed to keep the focus on decoding and discovery without any distractions.
